attributes.action: ban all use of pseudo scientific medicines, cures & practices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reiki,
Homeopathy,
Ear Candles,
Astrology,
Psychics & mediums,
this country is awash with people claiming these things are science based cures, remedies and practices when there is no evidence to support the claims but mountains of empirical evidence and scientific fact against,these charlatans offer hope at a price and with the Government actually spending our money on "treatments" that have been proven not to work something has to be done.
